text:
Apa ibukota Kalimantan Selatan? (Banjarmasin)
Apa ibukota Papua Barat? (Manokwari)
Soal Cerdas Cermat SD dan Jawabannya
Apa ibu kota Papua? (Jayapura)
Sebutkan sila pertama… (Ketuhanan Yang Maha Esa)
Sebutkan sila kedua… (Kemanusiaan yang adil dan beradab)
Apa rumah adat Provinsi Sumatera Barat? (Gadang)
Apa rumah adat Provinsi Bengkulu? (Bubungan lima)
Apa rumah adat Provinsi Jambi? (Panggung)
Dari mana alat musik tifa berasal? (Maluku dan Papua)
Dari mana alat musik gamelan berasal? (Sumatera, Bali, dan Jawa)
Dari mana alat musik tatabuang berasal? (Flores Timur)
Dari mana alat musik gambus berasal? (Riau)
Berikut daftar contoh soal atau pertanyaan untuk cerdas cermat kategori anak SD dan SMP beserta kunci jawaban:
Serangga yang memiliki rasa solidaritas tinggi adalah (Semut)
Binatang yang suka makan biji kopi dan kotorannya bisa dijadikan kopi adalah (Luwak)
Kota Tegal berada di provinsi? Jawa Tengah
Batu yang bisa mengapung disebut batu (Apung)
25 dibagi 5? 5
Zona waktu untuk Papua disebut? Waktu Indonesia Timur (WIT)
Gunung yang terletak di wilayah Tegal adalah? Gunung Slamet
8 x 8 adalah? 64
trans:
What is the capital of South Kalimantan? (Banjarmasin)
What is the capital of West Papua? (Manokwari)
Elementary School Quiz Questions and Answers
What is the capital of Papua? (Jayapura)
Mention the first principle... (The One and Only God)
Mention the second principle... (Just and Civilized Humanity)
What is the traditional house of West Sumatra Province? (Gadang)
What is the traditional house of Bengkulu Province? (Bubungan Lima)
What is the traditional house of Jambi Province? (Panggung)
Where does the tifa musical instrument come from? (Maluku and Papua)
Where does the gamelan musical instrument come from? (Sumatra, Bali, and Java)
Where does the tatabuang musical instrument come from? (East Flores)
Where does the gambus musical instrument come from? (Riau)
Here is a list of sample questions or quiz questions for the elementary and junior high school categories, along with the answer keys:
An insect that has a high sense of solidarity is? (Ant)
An animal that likes to eat coffee beans and whose droppings can be turned into coffee is? (Civet)
Tegal City is located in which province? (Central Java)
A type of stone that can float is called? (Floating stone)
25 divided by 5? (5)
The time zone for Papua is called? (Eastern Indonesian Time, WIT)
Which mountain is located in the Tegal area? (Mount Slamet)
8 x 8 equals? (64)
